attributes.action: Investigate the currents increases of fuel costs on the forecourts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that the Prime Minister launches an enquiry into the current fuel price increases on the garage forecourts. Why when the cost per barrel seems to have settled at between $43.00 to $48.00, do we see increases from the petrol companies of between 4 to 6 pence per litre on both petrol and diesel within a ten day period. Also to look at the area pricing differences that are found on forecourts and are they fair to the consumer.
